It is worth the small investment if you want to see Netflix movies and YouTube videos on a larger screen.
author: Amazon Customer

review: Great product for those who need it.I intended to use it for streaming downloaded movie files from my Nexus 5 android to my TV.Chromecast hooked up to my WiFi network flawlessly and was set up in less than 5 minutes.It was said that it would only work if I connected to the same WiFi network as my phone, but it works even when connected to a different WiFi emited by the same router.Works wll for music on google music, Youtube and googleplay movies.The problem is I can not find a suitable app to stream all video formats I need straight from the phone, I wish there was an official google app. That's why only 4 stars.As for streaming online content - it is a perfect solution.

author: Michael Smith

review: Usually I like Google products so I was hugely disappointed. All I want to do is watch Netflix on this TV. The connectivity issues are insane. Even once the setup was finally finished and it was hooked up to my wifi, the loading and buffering time was unbearable. My Wii used to be able to play Netflix on this exact same TV with no problems, so why can't Chromecast?If you do get it to work, there is no way to pause, rewind, fastforward, etc. You're supposed to be able to do it from your phone or Chrome browser. Neither worked for me.It completely froze a week into owning it, so I tried the trusty unplug-replug and now I can't get it to reconnect to my wifi network. I'm returning it and will get a Roku or Fire TV or something.
